items.name: WebVisualizerQuickStart
items.title: ParaViewWeb Visualizer - Quick start
items.description: The ParaView Web Visualizer is a Web application that tries to provide functionality similar to the ParaView Qt application. This 5 minute video will walk you through the basic usage of Web Visualizer.

items.name: VisualizerVolumeRendering
items.title: ParaViewWeb Visualizer - Volume Rendering
items.description: The ParaView Web Visualizer is a Web application that tries to provide functionality similar to the ParaView Qt application. This 1 minute video highlights how to edit the transfer function for volume rendering inside the Web Visualizer.

items.name: VisualizerSettingsLOD
items.title: ParaViewWeb Visualizer - View Settings for interactive LOD rendering
items.description: The ParaView Web Visualizer is a Web application that tries to provide functionality similar to the ParaView Qt application. This 1 minute video highlights how to edit the view settings to adjust when the LOD should be used while interacting with large data.

items.name: VisualizerContextualHelp
items.title: ParaViewWeb Visualizer - Contextual help
items.description: The ParaView Web Visualizer is a Web application that tries to provide functionality similar to the ParaView Qt application. This 20 second video highlights how the application aids the user by providing contextual descriptions of properties and range information.

items.name: WebVisualizer
items.title: ParaViewWeb generic visualizer
items.description: Generic web visualization and data processing with the WebVisualizer application that comes with ParaView 4.

items.name: OpenChemistry
items.title: Open Chemistry and ParaViewWeb
items.description: This video present the OpenChemistry web portal leveraging the ParaViewWeb framework to handle the 3D rendering of the molecule inside your Web browser.

items.name: Mummy
items.title: ParaViewWeb State based application
items.description: Show how ad-hoc web application can be created based on a ParaView state file

items.name: PWApp
items.title: Main ParaViewWeb application
items.description: Show an advanced ParaViewWeb application based on GWT

items.name: OpenChemistry1
items.title: Open Chemistry ParaViewWeb application
items.description: Show a usage of ParaViewWeb inside the OpenChemistry project

items.name: KiwiViewer connecting to ParaViewWeb
items.title: ParaViewWeb and Mobile devices
items.description: Show how mobile devices could use ParaViewWeb to generate 3D data so it could be rendered locally onto the device.
